snippet: JPMorgan reports an unexpected drop in fourth-quarter profit. | MetLife sues to fight its designation as “systemically important.” | The Bitcoin industry is wrestling with a price slump.
abstract: JPMorgan reports an unexpected drop in fourth-quarter profit. | MetLife sues to fight its designation as “systemically important.” | The Bitcoin industry is wrestling with a price slump.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Profit Falls at JPMorgan
